amendment.description: To strike the requirement for a study on the disclosure of additional intelligence information.

action.text: Senate vitiated previous passage on amendment SA 856.

vote.text: Amendment SA 856 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 856 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4559-4560, S4560-4562; text: CR S4561) To strike the requirement for a study on the disclosure of additional intelligence information.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 856 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 856 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
